metadata.description:
A wild road trip turns fatal when two friends, Ayush and Rishi, decide to take one last jaunt through the deserts of India on the eve of Rishi's wedding. Wildly inebriated, they run over a holy mystic, killing him instantly. Not knowing what else to do, the pair cremate the body.

Plagued by nightmares and horrific visions, the pair can't shake the events of that night. It appears as if the mystic they killed is determined not to go gentle into that good night... and his rage threatens to claim not only the souls of Rishi and Ayush, but the body of Rishi's fiancée as well. Can the pair find a way to save themselves before the wrath of a vengeful mystic destroys their entire world?
metadata.name: Linger
